block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Acquired RHP Dave Lee from Los Angeles for OF Alex Requena. Placed SS Omar Vizquel on the 60-day disabled list. TEXAS RANGERS--Purchased the contract of INF-OF Jermaine Clark from Oklahoma of the PCL. Transferred OF Kevin Mench from the 15-day to the 60-day disabled list.

American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Acquired RHP Dave Lee from Los Angeles for OF Alex Requena. Placed SS Omar Vizquel on the 60-day disabled list. TEXAS RANGERS--Purchased the contract of INF-OF Jermaine Clark from Oklahoma of the PCL. Transferred OF Kevin Mench from the 15-day to the 60-day disabled list.
National League CINCINNATI REDS--Recalled RHP Josh Hall from Chattanooga of the Southern League.
National Football League MIAMI DOLPHINS--Activated OT Greg Jerman from the practice squad. Released TE Marco Battaglia. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Placed FS Terreal Bierria on injured reserve.
National Hockey League COLORADO AVALANCHE--Re-signed LW Alex Tanguay to a one-year contract.
